Schematic illustration of the band structure and optical transitions of monolayer Mo X 2 and W X 2. Shown are the spin-dependent band structures near the K and K′ points, derived from first-principles calculations
12 , including the (helicity-selective) optical transitions and electronic configurations involved in A excitons and associated negatively charged trions (the lower spin–split valence band is not shown). Singlet trions are intervalley in Mo X 2 but intravalley in W X 2; the situation is reversed for triplet trions. Note that the depicted vertical transitions become mixed as a result of quasiparticle interactions
